thread.section_title: Price 4 Limo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Price 4 Limo | price4limo.com
thread.title: Heather

author: Heather
title: Heather
text: We reserved a limo bus for a party of 16 the week before we needed it. We were happy that it was available and the price was the best that we found after much searching. Our driver was exceptional and the limo bus was clean and well-stocked. We ended up having last minute changes to our destination and plans and our driver was happy to oblige. I would definitely use Price 4 Limo again.
